website_summaries.verdict: The Apple iPhone 6 is the right sized iPhone for right now, and it includes a bunch of AT&T technologies which will improve calls and data over the next year.

customer_reviews.title: LOCKED iPHONE 6!!! NEED REFUND!!!
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars. Its a locked phone. We were unable to activate it, as it's still attached to another plan. I will be returning this phone for a full refund. Disappointed, Andrea Sommer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: The small dents around the phone doesn't bother me at all. I've had this phone for months now and I have no problems with it at all! I got it activated to AT&T without any complications at all. I'm very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Da'Jena

customer_reviews.title: Black List Phone
customer_reviews.text: One of the phones became black list. I had to go and pay $100 to unlock the phone because T-Mobile had no signal to the phone. The cell phone kept saying searching at the top. I ordered two phones the other phone is working fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Jones- Trent

customer_reviews.title: My iPhone Shut off on me!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the phone it came with the installments (1 Star) My phone kept on shutting off but I was able to get it back on (Another Start) But one night my phone shut off and I wasn't able to get it back on. (The Last Star) I even tried force restarting it. Didn't work!!! :-(
customer_reviews.author: barbara h.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t have a good battery charge
customer_reviews.text: Battery easily drains only lasts about 2-3 hours if at that before it needs to be recharged. Phone quality is good battery is horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Keila Tzoyohua

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Much better than other retfurbs I have received. 100% functional
customer_reviews.author: J. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Terrible 100% garbage
customer_reviews.text: Phone kept turning off by itself. Will never buy a phone from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Trillpolo

customer_reviews.title: thye sent me a phone thats stopped charging after 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: thye sent me a phone thats stopped charging after 6 months of using it then i sent it back to them to fix the phone because i got the warranty on the phone then they said it was fixed and i just got it back and its not charging wtf
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Stick to Android
customer_reviews.text: The phone looked good. But it worked horribly. Always hung up never stayed charged even when I know I charged it. Battery life was just so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Shatonda Mccray

customer_reviews.title: Phone looks great but charger does not work :(
customer_reviews.text: Phone is in great condition but the charger sent with completely does not work. I tried multiple outlets/power bricks and nothing would make it charge hopefully when i get a working charger the phone turns on if not ill have to return it but the phone looks like it'll charge so hopefullyit does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatness!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! The customer service is extraordinary. I will definitely order again with this business. Plus the product is exactly how they decribed it to be.
customer_reviews.author: terrell brown

customer_reviews.title: The phone was scratched up and the charger didn't not ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone was scratched up and the charger didn't not work. It had a password in it too so I had to restart the phone on my own
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: They sell new phones with NO GUARANTEE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone new and it was defective and to my surprise it has no mac guarantee. And the custommer service they have really sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Vanina D.

customer_reviews.title: Just after a few days the screen went out and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just after a few days the screen went out and you couldn't see anything on it and the volume barely worked to begin with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had this phone for almost 3 years and I've ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for almost 3 years and I've never had any problems with it, came in prefect condition
customer_reviews.author: Maliyah

customer_reviews.title: For gods sake get a good case. had to have it fixed 2 times ...
customer_reviews.text: For gods sake get a good case. had to have it fixed 2 times and I fixed it myself 1 more time
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Return item
customer_reviews.text: The iphone that I bought from you is bad and accibteble so i want to know how to return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Unlocked
customer_reviews.text: I put my AT&T sim card in and it says that the phone does not support the carrier very dissappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought a new phone, nevertheless I was informed ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new phone, nevertheless I was informed by Apple that there was no guaranty for this iPhone. Is it true? Why did it happen? A new product should come with at least 1 year guaranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jose R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was a great phone the right color super fast shipping I was very happy with the phone.
customer_reviews.author: barbara a. tate- williams

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks after we received the phone the screen went black!!! It cost me $130.00 to get it repaired!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Willie Ann Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Boynton

customer_reviews.title: Came in very good condition like it was described
customer_reviews.text: Received the phone earlier than expected. Came in very good condition like it was described. Works great and had no problem activating it. Overall great experience with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective iPhone 6
customer_reviews.text: Product was refurbished I purchased as new. iPhone not working properly and it would shut off by itself. I returned it quickly and my money was refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falsely Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Mine was not for AT&T as it would not take my AT&T SIM card.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The phone came very early-awesome! So far it's wonderful. No scratches or scrapes and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor McCaw

customer_reviews.title: Design opportunities to improve
customer_reviews.text: Product works great unfortunately several areas in the design were limited such as water / bean capacity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone arrived as advertised. Bought it for my son and he is quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone. It's so awesome and the speaker is way louder than the 5s. Great
customer_reviews.author: Trendy gal

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this phone is great except for the fact that it will not charge. I have tried a dozen chargers, connected to the wall or a computer and nothing works. (I know the cables work because my other iPhone charges fine) I even tried cleaning the port. This is very aggravating since I bought this phone to replace another one that was broken far beyond repair. Now I have to wait even longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Hardware was in flawless form, but the software has been troubling me. I canthelp but think that the phone is slow although i have been very cautious with using it. It lags it glitches and im really disappiionted with this fact cause ive tried doing everthing. Overall i was satisfied and 3 stars would be fair
customer_reviews.author: M Walid

customer_reviews.title: Upon receiving the phone, I eventually found out that ...
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving the phone, I eventually found out that it was blacklisted for use by AT&T on account of it being a stolen phone. Very concerned by this, definitely want to leave this comment and let people know.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pié

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed about this i phone and about amazone because i ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed about this i phone and about amazone because i already payed for them and now i didn't even unlock this phone !
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Not complaining
customer_reviews.text: It came with a dent in it. Should have said that in the description. But ill accept it. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was just average for me. :/
customer_reviews.text: The iphone I purchased is usable but for the price I paid I was a little disappointed to find out that it has flaws. The light had a small glitches and would fade in and out when trying to take pictures & the screen itself was a bit raised as if it had been replaced before.
customer_reviews.author: gloria rocha

customer_reviews.title: PHONES GREAT BUT I PAID $600
customer_reviews.text: PHONES GREAT BUT I PAID $600.00 N DIDN'T GET THE CHARGER THAT IS SUPPOSE TO COME WITH IT OR THE HEADPHONES. I CAN CARE LESS ABOUT THE HEADPHONES. BUT, HELLO HOW WAS I SUPPOSE TO CHARGE THE PHONE. I HAD TO GO OUT N PURCHASE A CHARGER WITCH BY THE WAY WAS ANOTHER $20.00. SO I COULD CHARGE MY PHONE THAT NIGHT. RIDICULOUS......
customer_reviews.author: FELICIA SCHWALBAUCH

customer_reviews.title: iPhone locked
customer_reviews.text: the iphone is locked and not can I use with another operator
customer_reviews.author: Andrés Baquero

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Was a waste the phone motherboard was shot.. brought for my mom's the 1st month she had too get a new battery cause it wouldn't charge properly.. figured that was it. Then it just started acting weird the next 2 weeks took it into 2 separate shops and let them tell me what's wrong. They both said it was internal problems they couldn't fix. Would not recommend buying a used iPhone cause u just neva know
customer_reviews.author: BiZ WorLD

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this over getting a brand new phone
customer_reviews.text: Some small scratches on the corners and the AT&T guy pointed out that there is a small gap between the front and back of the phone (I hadn't even noticed), but all of that is more than worth how much money I saved by getting this phone second-hand. Highly recommend this over getting a brand new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal didn't pan out.
customer_reviews.text: Phone looked to be in great condition but once we put a SIM card in it and activated it, it froze up and shut down and even texted words itself when she would try to text someone. Thank goodness Amazon made it right. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: inspired

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: The phone was in a much better state than I could ever imagine. The price for this refurbished phone was so low, I expected the phone to be severely scratched, cracked or discolored. Thankfully, the only blemish was a scratch the size of an eyelash. I highly recommend buying product from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Jas Mine

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't have got a better deal!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for making this phone available at such a low price! Couldn't have got a better deal!!
customer_reviews.author: Maya Williamson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT USED PHONE
customer_reviews.text: Received this a few days early than the suggested delivery date. Very please with the product. Very limited scratches and product looks great for a used phone.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Screen very dim
customer_reviews.text: The images on the screen were very dim. Even when I would raise up the light on the screen it still looked very dim. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: ... for about a month now and everything is working great. I was very happy with the price and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for about a month now and everything is working great. I was very happy with the price and delivery speed.
customer_reviews.author: CMV

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Shipped fast & was exactly what the seller said. Had a minor scratch on the screen but was expected
customer_reviews.author: Network dude

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Needed to return -- we were not able to access the network.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected and works great brand new out the box
customer_reviews.author: Sa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This phone worked for a brief time then the screen stopped responding.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria Torena

customer_reviews.title: Working great and came when
customer_reviews.text: So far no problems. Working great and came when expected
customer_reviews.author: donna warren

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone 6 16 GB AT&T (Gold) Locked to AT&T
product_meta.description: Built on 64-bit desktop-class architecture, the new A8 chip delivers more power, even while driving a larger display.
feature_bullets: 4.7-inch LED-backlit IPS LCD Multi-Touchscreen Shatter proof Glass, Oleophobic Coating iOS 8 (upgradable)
8 Megapixel Camera (3264 x 2448 pixels) w/ Autofocus, dual-LED (dual tone) Flash + Front-Facing 1.2 Megapixel Camera, 720p, burst, HDR
Dual-Core 1.4 GHz Cyclone (ARM v8-based) Processor, Chipset: Apple A8, PowerVR GX6650 (hexa-core graphics) Graphics
Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi hotspot, Bluetooth: v4.0, A2DP, USB: v2.0, GPS: with A-GPS, GLONASS
Built-in rechargeable lithium-ion Battery, Talktime: Up to 14 Hours (3G), Standby: Up to 250 Hours (3G)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars156 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Touchscreen, Dual-band, Built-in-gps, Fingerprint-sensor, Mobile-hotspot-capability, Dual-camera, Lte, Smartphone
specifications.Other camera features: 8 MP Back Camera, 1.2 MP Front Camera
